body: i didn't expect him to drop it here
awesome doujinshi or whatever, but what the hell is a cloaca?
greatm8 is a fucking legend
i would like to see mina going into the direction of constantly tryna make him some what to like her then fuck

> "Mina's facial expressions are limited as well" Did we read the same doujin ? Surprise, confusion, vexation, determination, infatuation, cheekiness, playfulness, smugness, she just keeps changing expression every other page.
A-ayo..? Damn..
This was better than I thought and the art is lit
An unlikely duo, would've preferred it with Kirishima. I like the art style overall 6/10. Keep up the good work 👍
always need mina
Not even Kirishima, 0/10.
Very well done! I look forward to your future work!
I want that pink face on my balls
Holy crap for a first attempt, it's very impressive. Greatm8 at its best

"It kinda sucks"  

I think what he/she means is that it could have been much better. I love his work, but if you sit back and look at all the pages, they look incredibly similar. Mina's facial expressions are limited as well. Doesn't help at all that Tokoyami is a main character here, how the f would you make him expressive? One of the things I love from Greatm8t is the ability he has to make great expressions.

 Aside from Mina's incredibly ~PUFFY VULVA~, there's not much else body detail to appreciate from either character. Why is Yokoyami's penis such a similar shade of pink to Mina? Need some contrast man, make it darker or lighter than Mina. 

The plot is bare bones. 

 Among the entire body of doujinshis, yeah this is great. But when compared to the greats of doujins, it falls very short imo. (Yes I understand the artist cranked this baby out while he's also making a big animation.) That being said, Greatm8t is still the best MHA smutmaker out there.
For a first doujin, this is some very good work. Kind of a tease though
Mina is the best MHA gal
Yeah, this is why falco is top tier
"It kinda sucks" absolutely not. This was amazing. Hell its way better paneled then half the stuff I have seen.
way to go Falco
Great to see your stuff made it here GreatM8, keep up the good work mate
